title: yeosaga
author: yeosaga
created_time: March 02, 2023, 07:50:57 PMLast edit: March 03, 2023, 03:19:21 PM by yeosaga
content: CyberKongz Genesis NFT was launched in March 2021.Each Genesis yields $banana token (10 $banana per day, with a cutoff of 10 years after the contract launch) The CyberKongz team is the first to release a token yield from NFT (plus lock registry for NFT, which keeps NFT safe even if the wallet is compromised)Anyone is free to learn more about the project here: https://www.cyberkongz.com/aboutThe CyberKongz team later launched Play & Kollect, an engaging on-chain experience to find, mint, and collect new/existing NFTMore about Play & Kollect here: https://docs.cyberkongz.com/The CyberKongz team is working on more ideas for the $banana token along with other features within the project.$banana is claimed on Ethereum layer, and most other activities for it are on Polygon layer. $banana can be bridged to and from those two layers.Thanks for taking the time to learn about this NFT project. I am not part of this project, but have some knowledge with what they are up to, so feel free to ask any questions.
